item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Why Apple's Severance gets edited over remote desktop software (93 points | 37 comments)
2. Accessible open textbooks in math-heavy disciplines (78 points | 17 comments)
3. Veloren – voxel action-adventure role-playing in Rust (44 points | 3 comments)
4. Vramfs: Vram Based Filesystem for Linux (33 points | 4 comments)
5. Show HN: Physical Pomodoro Timer with ESP32 and e-paper screen (242 points | 58 comments)
6. Paged Out #6 is out (11 points | discuss)
7. Real Time Chess – A physical chess board without the concept of turns (112 points | 15 comments)
8. Postgres Language Server: Initial Release (225 points | 35 comments)
9. When the physicists need burner phones, that's when you know America's changed (14 points | 1 comment)
10. Plain – a web framework for building products with Python (247 points | 140 comments)
11. Typed Japanese (31 points | 5 comments)
12. Show HN: I implemented Snake in a tmux config file (13 points | discuss)
13. TSMC, Intel and other top chipmakers slow Japan, Malaysia expansions (15 points | 1 comment)
14. We hacked Gemini's Python sandbox and leaked its source code (at least some) (607 points | 125 comments)
15. Chimpanzees act as 'engineers', choosing materials to make tools (80 points | 56 comments)
16. Low responsiveness of ML models to critical or deteriorating health conditions (68 points | 39 comments)
17. Beyond Bohr and Einstein (33 points | 2 comments)
18. Mathematical Compact Models of Advanced Transistors [pdf] (69 points | 17 comments)
19. Rubik's Cube Solutions, Puzzles, and 8-Balls (2023) (15 points | 3 comments)
20. Koto Programming Language (117 points | 94 comments)
21. Show HN: Bknd – Firebase alternative that embeds into any React stack (36 points | 14 comments)
22. AI generated Ghibli images go viral as OpenAI loosens its rules (8 points | 6 comments)
23. Playstation Mod Turns the PSOne into a Crustacean (91 points | 20 comments)
24. Show HN Pianoboi – displays sheet music as you play your piano (88 points | 20 comments)
25. New open-source benchmark for real-time analytics applications (13 points | 2 comments)
26. Digital Echoes and Unquiet Minds (158 points | 76 comments)
27. Caido – A lightweight web security auditing toolkit (21 points | 2 comments)
28. Optimizing Matrix Multiplication on RDNA3 (112 points | 22 comments)
29. Finley (YC W21) Is Hiring a Technical Implementations Specialist ( | hide)
30. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (123 points | 26 comments)
